INT SerialServerSocket::Accept (  SerialSocket &  clientSock,
SocketAddr &  addr
) 
 

Accepts the incoming connection on a socket.

Parameters:
clientSock client socket that will be used for communication after accepting the connection
addr Reference to a SocketAddr object. This will contain remote device parameters on successful connection
Returns:
0 on success and -1 on failure.

INT SerialServerSocket::Bind (  SocketAddr &  serv_addr  ) 
 

Gives the socket the local address.

Parameters:
serv_addr Reference to a SocketAddr object.
Returns:
0 on success and -1 on failure.

Listens for the connections on a socket

Parameters:
Backlog no of the connections that can be queued.
Returns:
0 on success and -1 on failure.
